meanings.definition: To visit a place before the actual visit.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy previsiting new cities to plan my itinerary.
meanings.sent2: She always previsits the museum to avoid crowds.
meanings.sent3: Previsiting the theme park helped us decide which rides to go on first.
meanings.sent4: His habit of previsiting restaurants saved us from waiting in long lines.
meanings.sent5: Previsiting the beach made our vacation more organized and enjoyable.

meanings.definition: The act of visiting a place beforehand.
meanings.sent1: Her previsiting of the hotel helped her feel more prepared for the trip.
meanings.sent2: The previsiting of the campus gave us a good idea of where everything was located.
meanings.sent3: The previsiting of the park turned out to be a fun adventure on its own.
meanings.sent4: Their previsiting of the neighborhood made moving in much easier.
meanings.sent5: The previsiting of the store allowed us to make a shopping list ahead of time.
